56 MoveGroupSequenceAction::MoveGroupSequenceAction() : MoveGroupCapability("SequenceAction")
57 {
58 }
59 
60 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::initialize()
61 {
62  // start the move action server
63  ROS_INFO_STREAM("initialize move group sequence action");
64  move_action_server_ = std::make_unique<actionlib::SimpleActionServer<moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceAction>>(
65  root_node_handle_, "sequence_move_group",
66  boost::bind(&MoveGroupSequenceAction::executeSequenceCallback, this, _1), false);
67  move_action_server_->registerPreemptCallback(boost::bind(&MoveGroupSequenceAction::preemptMoveCallback, this));
68  move_action_server_->start();
69 
70  command_list_manager_ = std::make_unique<pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CommandListManager>(
71  ros::NodeHandle("~"), context_->planning_scene_monitor_->getRobotModel());
72 }
73 
74 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::executeSequenceCallback(const moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceGoalConstPtr& goal)
75 {
76  setMoveState(move_group::PLANNING);
77 
78  // Handle empty requests
79  if (goal->request.items.empty())
80  {
81  ROS_WARN("Received empty request. That's ok but maybe not what you intended.");
82  setMoveState(move_group::IDLE);
83  moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceResult action_res;
84  action_res.response.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
85  move_action_server_->setSucceeded(action_res, "Received empty request.");
86  return;
87  }
88 
89  // before we start planning, ensure that we have the latest robot state
90  // received...
91  context_->planning_scene_monitor_->waitForCurrentRobotState(ros::Time::now());
92  context_->planning_scene_monitor_->updateFrameTransforms();
93 
94  moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceResult action_res;
95  if (goal->planning_options.plan_only || !context_->allow_trajectory_execution_)
96  {
97  if (!goal->planning_options.plan_only)
98  {
99  ROS_WARN("Only plan will be calculated, although plan_only == false."); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
100  }
101  executeMoveCallbackPlanOnly(goal, action_res);
102  }
103  else
104  {
105  executeSequenceCallbackPlanAndExecute(goal, action_res);
106  }
107 
108  switch (action_res.response.error_code.val)
109  {
110  case moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS:
111  move_action_server_->setSucceeded(action_res, "Success");
112  break;
113  case moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PREEMPTED:
114  move_action_server_->setPreempted(action_res, "Preempted");
115  break;
116  default:
117  move_action_server_->setAborted(action_res, "See error code for more information");
118  break;
119  }
120 
121  setMoveState(move_group::IDLE);
122 }
123 
124 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::executeSequenceCallbackPlanAndExecute(
125  const moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceGoalConstPtr& goal, moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceResult& action_res)
126 {
127  ROS_INFO("Combined planning and execution request received for "
128  "MoveGroupSequenceAction.");
129 
130  plan_execution::PlanExecution::Options opt;
131 
132  const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& planning_scene_diff =
133  moveit::core::isEmpty(goal->planning_options.planning_scene_diff.robot_state) ?
134  goal->planning_options.planning_scene_diff :
135  clearSceneRobotState(goal->planning_options.planning_scene_diff);
136 
137  opt.replan_ = goal->planning_options.replan;
138  opt.replan_attempts_ = goal->planning_options.replan_attempts;
139  opt.replan_delay_ = goal->planning_options.replan_delay;
140  opt.before_execution_callback_ = boost::bind(&MoveGroupSequenceAction::startMoveExecutionCallback, this);
141 
142  opt.plan_callback_ =
143  boost::bind(&MoveGroupSequenceAction::planUsingSequenceManager, this, boost::cref(goal->request), _1);
144 
145  if (goal->planning_options.look_around && context_->plan_with_sensing_)
146  {
147  ROS_WARN("Plan with sensing not yet implemented/tested. This option is "
148  "ignored."); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
149  }
150 
151  plan_execution::ExecutableMotionPlan plan;
152  context_->plan_execution_->planAndExecute(plan, planning_scene_diff, opt);
153 
154  StartStatesMsg start_states_msg;
155  convertToMsg(plan.plan_components_, start_states_msg, action_res.response.planned_trajectories);
156  try
157  {
158  action_res.response.sequence_start = start_states_msg.at(0);
159  }
160  catch (std::out_of_range&)
161  {
162  ROS_WARN("Can not determine start state from empty sequence.");
163  }
164  action_res.response.error_code = plan.error_code_;
165 }
166 
167 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::convertToMsg(const ExecutableTrajs& trajs, StartStatesMsg& start_states_msg,
168  PlannedTrajMsgs& planned_trajs_msgs)
169 {
170  start_states_msg.resize(trajs.size());
171  planned_trajs_msgs.resize(trajs.size());
172  for (size_t i = 0; i < trajs.size(); ++i)
173  {
174  robot_state::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(trajs.at(i).trajectory_->getFirstWayPoint(), start_states_msg.at(i));
175  trajs.at(i).trajectory_->getRobotTrajectoryMsg(planned_trajs_msgs.at(i));
176  }
177 }
178 
179 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::executeMoveCallbackPlanOnly(const moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceGoalConstPtr& goal,
180  moveit_msgs::MoveGroupSequenceResult& res)
181 {
182  ROS_INFO("Planning request received for MoveGroupSequenceAction action.");
183 
184  // lock the scene so that it does not modify the world representation while
185  // diff() is called
186  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO lscene(context_->planning_scene_monitor_);
187 
188  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& the_scene =
189  (moveit::core::isEmpty(goal->planning_options.planning_scene_diff)) ?
190  static_cast<const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr&>(lscene) :
191  lscene->diff(goal->planning_options.planning_scene_diff);
192 
193  ros::Time planning_start = ros::Time::now();
194  RobotTrajCont traj_vec;
195  try
196  {
197  // Select planning_pipeline to handle request
198  // All motions in the SequenceRequest need to use the same planning pipeline (but can use different planners)
199  const planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr planning_pipeline =
200  resolvePlanningPipeline(goal->request.items[0].req.pipeline_id);
201  if (!planning_pipeline)
202  {
203  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not load planning pipeline " << goal->request.items[0].req.pipeline_id);
204  res.response.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE;
205  return;
206  }
207 
208  traj_vec = command_list_manager_->solve(the_scene, planning_pipeline, goal->request);
209  }
210  catch (const MoveItErrorCodeException& ex)
211  {
212  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("> Planning pipeline threw an exception (error code: " << ex.getErrorCode() << "): " << ex.what());
213  res.response.error_code.val = ex.getErrorCode();
214  return;
215  }
216  // LCOV_EXCL_START // Keep moveit up even if lower parts throw
217  catch (const std::exception& ex)
218  {
219  ROS_ERROR("Planning pipeline threw an exception: %s", ex.what());
220  res.response.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE;
221  return;
222  }
223  // LCOV_EXCL_STOP
224 
225  StartStatesMsg start_states_msg;
226  start_states_msg.resize(traj_vec.size());
227  res.response.planned_trajectories.resize(traj_vec.size());
228  for (RobotTrajCont::size_type i = 0; i < traj_vec.size(); ++i)
229  {
230  move_group::MoveGroupCapability::convertToMsg(traj_vec.at(i), start_states_msg.at(i),
231  res.response.planned_trajectories.at(i));
232  }
233  try
234  {
235  res.response.sequence_start = start_states_msg.at(0);
236  }
237  catch (std::out_of_range&)
238  {
239  ROS_WARN("Can not determine start state from empty sequence.");
240  }
241 
242  res.response.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
243  res.response.planning_time = ros::Time::now().toSec() - planning_start.toSec();
244 }
245 
246 bool MoveGroupSequenceAction::planUsingSequenceManager(const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req,
247  plan_execution::ExecutableMotionPlan& plan)
248 {
249  setMoveState(move_group::PLANNING);
250 
251  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO lscene(plan.planning_scene_monitor_);
252  RobotTrajCont traj_vec;
253  try
254  {
255  // Select planning_pipeline to handle request
256  // All motions in the SequenceRequest need to use the same planning pipeline (but can use different planners)
257  const planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr planning_pipeline =
258  resolvePlanningPipeline(req.items[0].req.pipeline_id);
259  if (!planning_pipeline)
260  {
261  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not load planning pipeline " << req.items[0].req.pipeline_id);
262  return false;
263  }
264 
265  traj_vec = command_list_manager_->solve(plan.planning_scene_, planning_pipeline, req);
266  }
267  catch (const MoveItErrorCodeException& ex)
268  {
269  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Planning pipeline threw an exception (error code: " << ex.getErrorCode() << "): " << ex.what());
270  plan.error_code_.val = ex.getErrorCode();
271  return false;
272  }
273  // LCOV_EXCL_START // Keep MoveIt up even if lower parts throw
274  catch (const std::exception& ex)
275  {
276  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Planning pipeline threw an exception: " << ex.what());
277  plan.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE;
278  return false;
279  }
280  // LCOV_EXCL_STOP
281 
282  if (!traj_vec.empty())
283  {
284  plan.plan_components_.resize(traj_vec.size());
285  for (size_t i = 0; i < traj_vec.size(); ++i)
286  {
287  plan.plan_components_.at(i).trajectory_ = traj_vec.at(i);
288  plan.plan_components_.at(i).description_ = "plan";
289  }
290  }
291  plan.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
292  return true;
293 }
294 
295 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::startMoveExecutionCallback()
296 {
297  setMoveState(move_group::MONITOR);
298 }
299 
300 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::preemptMoveCallback()
301 {
302  context_->plan_execution_->stop();
303 }
304 
305 void MoveGroupSequenceAction::setMoveState(move_group::MoveGroupState state)
306 {
307  move_state_ = state;
308  move_feedback_.state = stateToStr(state);
309  move_action_server_->publishFeedback(move_feedback_);
310 }
